fields.title: New
fields.description: The item is brand new and has never been used. It should be in perfect condition with no wear or damage.

fields.title: Like New
fields.description: This condition is typically used for items that are essentially new but may have been opened or used briefly. They should show minimal to no signs of wear.

fields.title: Excellent
fields.description: This condition may be used for items that are in exceptional condition, showing minimal signs of use. It implies a high level of care and maintenance.

fields.title: Good
fields.description: Items in good condition may have some visible wear, but they are still fully functional and may have plenty of life left in them.

fields.title: Fair
fields.description: This condition suggests that the item has noticeable wear, cosmetic flaws, or minor defects but is still usable.

fields.title: Poor
fields.description: Items in poor condition may have significant wear, damage, or defects that affect their functionality or appearance. They may require repair or refurbishment.

fields.title: As-Is
fields.description: When an item is listed as is, it means the seller is not offering any guarantees or warranties about its condition, and the buyer assumes all risks.
